alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 8:57AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Forecast flooding increased in duration for the following rivers in Utah... Bear River At Corinne affecting Box Elder County. .Snowmelt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from Cutler Dam to the Great Salt Lake. For the Bear River...including Corinne...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Bear River At Corinne. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Minor flooding will occur to agricultural land and associated roads adjacent to the Bear River near the Great Salt Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM MDT Monday the stage was 15.8 feet. - The Bear River near Corrinne is rising this morning. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near to above minor flood stage until further notice. - Flood stage is 15.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM MDT.
